name: FAP & CUM: Simulator 🔞💦
description:
FAP & CUM: Simulator 🔞💦 is a casual clicker adult game.

When life gets boring and regular entertainment no longer brings excitement, nothing can save you like the casual clicker game FAP & CUM: Simulator 🔞💦. This game is for adults and challenges you to become a famous model on social media, but wait, it's not just about undressing and posing in front of the camera.



The main character needs your help to become a social media star. You'll have to solve various mini-games, each task requiring maximum attention and quick reaction time. You can earn resources to unlock new photo and video content, which will be posted on social media.



However, be prepared for challenges that await you on your path to fame. Be careful, as different tasks require your character to show creativity and unpredictability.



Your goal is to gain as many followers as possible and earn as much money as possible. The more new content you publish, the more you'll be noticed and found by your followers. So be ready for new challenges and enjoy the game, helping your character become a social media star!

Game Features:

  • Beautiful female main character
  • Unlock upgrades to boost profits
  • Setting like popular social media
  • Incredible clicker mechanics
  • Awesome 3D animations &videos
  • Ability to play with one hand

ALL CHARACTERS IN THE GAME ARE OVER 18 YEARS OLD
